```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(raster)
library(macleish)
library(leaflet)
```

Trying to get elevation data:
```{r}
elevation <- mass_gis(layer = "contours250k")
```


Plotting:
```{r}
macleish_elevation <- elevation %>%
 st_join(data = macleish_layers[["boundary"]], join = st_within, left = FALSE)

leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolylines(data = elevation)
```
